member.name: T:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsCatalogFeedSecurity
member.summary: Handles credentials verifying for Strands Recommender catalog.

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsCatalogFeedSecurity.CheckCredentials(System.Web.HttpContext)
member.summary: Checks whether user is properly authenticated with username and password set in Strands settings. If user is not authenticated and username or password are set in Strands settings, user is prompted to authenticate and false is returned.
member.returns: True if authentication is disabled or user is properly authenticated; otherwise false

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsCatalogFeedSecurity.SetUnauthorizedStatus
member.summary: Checks whether current status code is 319. If true, sets response status code to 401 Unauthorized, so the browser will prompt user to enter credentials.

member.name: T:CMS.StrandsRecommender.IStrandsCatalogCategoryMapper
member.summary: Maps properties of the document to the ones used in the Strands catalog feed and other places.

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.IStrandsCatalogCategoryMapper.GetItemCategory(CMS.DocumentEngine.TreeNode)
member.summary: Retrieves property which will be used as category field in the Strands catalog feed.
member.returns: Category field

member.name: T:CMS.StrandsRecommender.DefaultStrandsCatalogCategoryMapper
member.summary: Default implementation of which returns NodeClassID as category field.

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.DefaultStrandsCatalogCategoryMapper.GetItemCategory(CMS.DocumentEngine.TreeNode)
member.summary: Retrieves NodeClassID which will be used as category field in the Strands catalog feed.
member.returns: Category field

member.name: T:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsCatalogPropertiesMapper
member.summary: Methods in this class map properties of the document to the ones used in the Strands catalog feed.

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsCatalogPropertiesMapper.GetItemID(CMS.DocumentEngine.TreeNode)
member.summary: Retrieves document NodeID which will be used as ItemID in the Strands catalog feed. Behavior of this method can't be changed because implementation of Strands integration is dependent on it.
member.returns: ID of the catalog item

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsCatalogPropertiesMapper.GetItemCategory(CMS.DocumentEngine.TreeNode)
member.summary: Retrieves NodeClassID which will be used as category field in the Strands catalog feed. Returned value can be changed easily by using different implementation of IStrandsCatalogCategoryMapper. This can be done by calling ObjectFactory<IStrandsCatalogCategoryMapper>.SetDefaultObjectTypeTo<NameOfDifferentImplementation>() somewhere during Init phase.
member.returns: Category field specified by implementation of

member.summary: Default constructor

member.name: T:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsSetupCall
member.summary: Loads settings related with automatic catalog upload, creates call data object and performs setup call to Strands Recommender.

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsSetupCall.DoWithDefaults
member.summary: Updates Strands Recommender settings with automatic setup call. Uses values provided in settings or the default, hard-coded ones.

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsSetupCall.LogSetupCallResult(System.Threading.Tasks.Task{CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsSetupCallStatusCodeEnum})
member.summary: Logs the setup call result

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsSetupCall.CreateDefaultSettingsData(System.String)
member.summary: Creates new instance of StrandsSetupCallData and fills it with default values (the ones, that cannot be changed in settings).
member.param: Culture suffix used in definition of field mappings
member.returns: Instance of StrandsSetupCallData filled with predefined values

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsSetupCall.LogSetupCallResult(CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsSetupCallStatusCodeEnum)
member.summary: Handles setup call response and perform info/exception logging.
member.param: Response given by Strands Recommender after setup call is performed

member.name: T:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsRecommenderHandlers
member.summary: Contains handlers of the Strands recommendation module.

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsRecommenderHandlers.Init
member.summary: Connects handlers to events.

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsRecommenderHandlers.RememberDelayedRendering(System.Object,CMS.Base.CMSEventArgs{CMS.Activities.IActivityInfo})
member.summary: Remembers information that purchased or cart update events happened, so tracking script can be rendered later.
member.remarks: This is needed, because there comes a redirect after mentioned activities are performed. This means that HTTP response is 302 and is not rendered on the client side and thus JavaScript is not executed. Therefore information that event happened is stored to user's cookie and is retrieved later, when response is 200.

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsRecommenderHandlers.SetUnauthorizedStatus(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Checks whether current status code is 319. If true, sets response status code to 401 Unauthorized, so the browser will prompt user to enter credentials.

member.name: T:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Internal.StrandsEventsMemory
member.summary: When it isn't right time to render Strands tracking event (for example the HTTP response status is 302, so JavaScripts wouldn't be executed), this class can remember the information about the event and when the time is right, it will provide information that event tracking is pending.
member.remarks: Class uses Cookies internally to remember pending events. This is needed, because there comes a redirect after items are purchased or shopping cart is updated. This means that HTTP response is 302 and is not rendered on the client side and thus JavaScript is not executed. Therefore information that event happened is stored to user's cookie and is retrieved later, when response is 200.

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Internal.StrandsEventsMemory.RememberCartUpdateEvent
member.summary: Stores information that cart update event should be rendered. After calling this method, method will return true once for the same user. Information will be stored in Cookies.

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Internal.StrandsEventsMemory.IsCartUpdateEventPending
member.summary: Checks if cart update event should be rendered. This method returns true only once and after that assumes that event has been rendered.
member.returns: True if cart update event should be rendered

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Internal.StrandsEventsMemory.RememberItemsPurchasedEvent(System.Int32)
member.summary: Stores information that items purchased event should be rendered. After calling this method, method will return true once for the same user. Information will be stored in Cookies.
member.param: ID of the order which was made

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Internal.StrandsEventsMemory.IsItemsPurchasedEventPending(System.Int32@)
member.summary: Checks if item purchased event should be rendered. This method returns true only once and after that assumes that event has been rendered.
member.param: Output parameter which will be set to the value passed to the method when storing information about pending event
member.returns: True if cart update event should be rendered

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Internal.StrandsEventsMemory.RememberEvent(System.String,System.IConvertible)
member.summary: Stores information about pending event to the cookie.
member.param: Associated data which will be stored and returned when method succeeds. Has to implement IConvertible to be able to cast value to string with invariant culture

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Internal.StrandsEventsMemory.IsEventPending``1(System.String,``0@)
member.summary: Checks if the particular event is pending by checking data in the cookie. If this method returns true, it automatically removes data from cookie, so next time it returns false again.
member.typeparam: Type of associated data, has to implement IConvertible
member.param: Associated data stored when event was set
member.returns: True if event was pending, otherwise false

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.Internal.StrandsEventsMemory.GetTrackingEventCookieKey(System.String)
member.summary: Gets key which will be used to store information about pending events.
member.returns: Generated key

member.name: T:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsSetupCallData
member.summary: Wraps all necessary data required for setup call performing.

member.name: P:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsSetupCallData.ValidationToken
member.summary: Validation token.

member.name: P:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsSetupCallData.Version
member.summary: Version sent to Strands Recommender. CMS build version should be used.

member.name: P:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsSetupCallData.FeedActive
member.summary: True if updating feed is enabled, false otherwise.

member.name: P:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsSetupCallData.FeedFrequency
member.summary: Frequency with which should be feed sending to the Strands Recommender.
member.remarks: Has to be in specific format {d|w|h}{\d+}. d stands for daily update, number has to be from interval 0-23 (eg. d0, d15, d23) w stands for weekly update, number has to be from interval 0-6 (mondays to sundays, eg. w0, w3, w6) h stands for hourly update, number has to be from interval 1-12 (every n hour, eg. h1, h7, h12)

member.name: P:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsSetupCallData.Type
member.summary: Type parameter of setup call, 'kentico' value is required by Strands.

member.name: P:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsSetupCallData.FeedUrl
member.summary: Uri of product catalog feed.

member.name: P:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsSetupCallData.Tracking
member.summary: Events which should be tracked by Strands Recommender.

member.name: P:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsSetupCallData.Fields
member.summary: Contains pairs for mapping values from feed to the Strands Recommender.

member.name: P:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsSetupCallData.Pagination
member.summary: Number of products per page.

member.name: P:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsSetupCallData.CatalogFeedUsername
member.summary: Username required to access catalog feed page.

member.name: P:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsSetupCallData.CatalogFeedPassword
member.summary: Password required to access catalog feed page.

member.summary: Occurs when no status code is present in document.

member.summary: Success response.

member.summary: Gets whether this handler can be reused for other request. This property is required by IHttpHandler interface.

member.summary: Processes request and generates XML feed of documents to the HTTP response.

member.summary: Generates XML catalog and writes it to the output stream.
member.param: Indicates if paging is enabled and what page shall be returned

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsCatalogFeed.GetCurrencies
member.summary: Gets list containing all enabled currencies with set Exchange rate. If main currency is specified, it is added to the list.
member.returns: Collection of all available currencies

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsCatalogFeed.WriteCatalogBeginning(System.Xml.XmlTextWriter,System.Int32)
member.summary: Writes beginning of XML file and appends feed description required by Strands.

member.summary: Retrieves products from the database with the paging specified by the applied.

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsCatalogFeed.GetAllProducts
member.summary: Retrieves all products from the database.

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsCatalogFeed.GetCatalogItems(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{CMS.DocumentEngine.TreeNode})
member.summary: Creates Catalog items from the list of tree nodes which shall be included in the catalog. One tree node in represents one language version of the document. Documents belonging to the same node will be grouped into one CatalogItem.
member.param: Documents (all language versions) included in the feed
member.returns: List of items which shall be included in the catalog, containing node ID, language versions, SKU object and category of product

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsCatalogFeed.GetBaseDocumentQuery
member.summary: Creates MultiDocumentQuery with properties (path, document types, etc.) set to the values specified in settings. Only documents from current site are returned. Culture filter is not set.

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsCatalogFeed.GetPagingInfoFromQueryParameters
member.summary: Returns information about paging which should be applied to the catalog feed. If pagination is enabled at Strands, request contains offset and maxcount parameters determining what products shall be included. If parameters are not present, it indicates that paging is not enabled.

member.summary: Holds all retrieved catalog items and count of the total items in database.

member.summary: Holds data about one item in the catalog.

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsApiClient.DoSetupCallAsync(CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsSetupCallData)
member.summary: The call sets up fields in Strands Recommender settings. Eg. number of products per page, frequency of catalog update, URL from which should Strands download the catalog, mapping between catalog feed elements and Strands fields etc. Most of the values are predefined and cannot be changed by user. Only exceptions are enabling/disabling of automatic download of catalog from Strands and frequency of this download.
member.returns: Task with result of asynchronous call

member.summary: Gets the setup call response status code

member.summary: Gets HTTP status code from given WebException.
member.returns: HTTP status code or 0 if not available

member.summary: Checks, whether response from Strands API when using template call is valid (Strands is returning status code 0).
member.exception: Response from Strands API is not successful

member.name: T:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsProductsProvider
member.summary: Helper methods for fetching various data needed mainly by Strands Recommendation web part. In general, data are fetched from the contexts (i.e. EcommerceContext) and database.

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsProductsProvider.GetItemIDsFromCurrentShoppingCart
member.summary: Gets all products from current user shopping cart and finds corresponding nodes.
member.returns: Collection containing all node IDs representing current user shopping cart items

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsProductsProvider.GetItemsIDsFromRecentOrder
member.summary: Gets all products from current customer/user most recent order and finds corresponding nodes.
member.returns: Collection containing all node IDs representing current customer/user most recent order

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsProductsProvider.GetCustomerRelatedToCurrentContact
member.summary: Gets Customer ID related to current contact.
member.returns: ID of related customer

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsProductsProvider.GetNodeIDsForSKUs(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Gets tree node for every SKU item given and returns its nodeID.
member.returns: Collection containing nodeIDs of all tree nodes corresponding to given SKU items

member.name: M:CMS.StrandsRecommender.StrandsProductsProvider.GetSKURootID(CMS.Ecommerce.SKUInfo)
member.summary: Get SKUID of SKU parent, if exists. Otherwise gets ID of SKU itself.
member.param: SKU should be ID taken from
member.remarks: If SKU is of the type variant, it does not have connection with tree node, whose ID is used for item identification. Thus its SKU parent tree node ID has to be used instead
member.returns: SKUParentID, if not null, SKUID otherwise
